April 1, 1900 Help To Be Given Our Schools.

        [Extracts from an article by Mrs. E. G. White, Jan. 23, 1900.] 

     I have not been able to sleep since one o'clock. I am troubled in regard to the debt on Battle Creek College. . . . In the night season I seemed to see several looking over the account books of the Review and Herald. In these books were recorded the interest on the money loaned to the school.
